data.meanings: to be low/lower/lowest, mean/despicable/vile/base/inferior, nethermost, downward, below.
data.sentence: The word أَسْفَلَ comes from the root س ف ل and is associated with the meanings: to be low/lower/lowest, mean/despicable/vile/base/inferior, nethermost, downward, below.

data.meanings: to send back, turn back, reject, refuse, repel, revert, restore, give back, refer, give again, take again, repeat, retrace. maraddun - place where one returns. mardud - restored, averted. irtadda (vb. 8) - to return, turn again, be rendered. taradda (vb. 5) - to be agitated, move to and fro.
data.sentence: The word رَدَدْنَاهُ comes from the root ر د د and is associated with the meanings: to send back, turn back, reject, refuse, repel, revert, restore, give back, refer, give again, take again, repeat, retrace. maraddun - place where one returns. mardud - restored, averted. irtadda (vb. 8) - to return, turn again, be rendered. taradda (vb. 5) - to be agitated, move to and fro.
